cookie.title: Cookie Preferences
cookie.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and provide personalized content. Some cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled. Other cookies require your consent.
cookie.policyChanged: Our cookie policy has been updated. Please review and agree to the updated terms.

necessary.title: Essential Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the basic functionality of the website and cannot be disabled.
necessary.features:
• Session management
• Security features
• Website performance

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how the website is used to improve user experience.
analytics.features:
• Google Analytics
• User behavior analysis
• Performance monitoring

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to display relevant ads and measure advertising effectiveness.
marketing.features:
• Google Ads
• Ad personalization
• Conversion tracking

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Remember your settings and preference choices.
preferences.features:
• Language selection
• Display preferences
• User settings

privacy.title: Privacy Information:
privacy.description: We are committed to complying with GDPR and other privacy regulations. You can manage cookies at any time in your browser settings or contact us to withdraw consent. For detailed information about how we use cookies, please see our

revoke.title: Withdraw Consent
revoke.description: Withdraw all cookie consents and reset to essential cookies only. You can re-enable other cookies at any time.
revoke.confirmDescription: This will withdraw your consent for all non-essential cookies. The website will only use essential cookies. Are you sure you want to continue?

home.heroSubtitle: Professional technical teams and cutting-edge solutions to create greater business value for your enterprise, leading new trends in industry digital development.
home.whyChooseSubtitle: Innovation makes good products, Focus makes better services
home.ctaText: We are committed to providing you with the best service and support.
home.featureAboutContent: Tianjin SENTINEL Electronics Co., Ltd is an innovative scientific and technological enterprise integrating R&D, production, and sales. SENTINEL provides industrial Ethernet distributed I/O modules, IO-Link products, position sensors, process sensors and connection accessories.
home.featureApplicationsContent: SENTINEL has a wide range of products and a professional R&D team. Our products have been widely used in various industrial production sites such as automotive parts assembly, machining and metallurgy industries.
home.featureTeamContent: As an R&D and manufacturing enterprise, SENTINEL adheres to the values of innovation and quality, with reliable market application cases, solid production capacity and efficient logistics to ensure high-quality, sustainable service.

products.title: PRODUCTS
products.subtitle: We provide a full range of technical products and professional services to help factory automation transformation and upgrade, improve business efficiency and competitive advantage.
products.serviceSubtitle: Standardized service processes to ensure product quality and delivery efficiency
products.needsAnalysisDesc: Deeply understand customer needs and formulate detailed product plans
products.ioModuleDescription: Equipment is installed nearby to reduce wiring costs
products.ioLinkDescription: IO-Link enables communication between sensors and PLCs.

about.title: About
about.intro: Tianjin SENTINEL Electronics Co., Ltd is an innovative Scientific and technological enterprise integrating R&D, production, and sales.
about.overviewP1: SENTINEL provides industrial ethernet distributed I/O modules & IO-Link products, position sensors, process sensors, and connection accessories, etc.
about.overviewP2: As an R & D and manufacturing enterprise, SENTINEL adheres to the value concept of R & D and innovation and has reliable market application cases, perfect production capacity, efficient logistics transportation, Our team have sincere cooperation awareness to ensure high quality, which can provide you with reliable and sustainable service.
about.missionText: Pioneer industrial sensors and IO-LINK modules via relentless R&D. Deliver precise, reliable solutions to drive seamless automation, efficiency, and sustainable industrial growth.
about.visionText: Become the global benchmark in industrial sensing and IO-LINK tech. Connect industrial ecosystems with innovative solutions, shaping a smarter, more interconnected manufacturing world.

2008.title: 2008 Company Establishment
2008.content: Tianjin SENTINEL was established in Tianjin Hi-Tech Zone in 2008. The company initially focused on the research and development and manufacturing of sensors and fieldbus equipment to meet the needs of industrial applications.

2010.title: 2010 Product Development & Expansion
2010.content: In 2010, the company successfully developed and mass-produced inductive proximity switches, solidifying its position in the industrial sensor field. In 2011, it expanded production facilities to support future business growth.

2013.title: Sensor Innovation
2013.content: In 2013, the company developed and mass-produced flow, temperature, and pressure sensors, expanding its product line.

2015.title: Factory Intelligence Enhancement
2015.content: In 2015, the company further entered the field of fieldbus and industrial Ethernet by launching remote I/O modules. The application of this technology significantly enhanced the intelligence level of factory automation.

2019.title: IO-Link Technology Breakthrough
2019.content: In 2019, the company made a significant breakthrough in IO-Link technology by successfully launching IO-Link Master and Device products, achieving standardized data transmission and digital management from field sensors to the central control system.

2023.title: 2023 Future Vision
2023.content: In 2023, the company further enhanced IO-Link technology by launching sensor products with IO-Link functionality, making them more efficient in industrial automation and equipment management. In the future, the company will continue to innovate in sensor and IO technologies, driving the development of Industry 4.0 and smart manufacturing.

2025.title: New Era of Intelligence
2025.content: In this rapidly changing era, industrial automation and artificial intelligence are working hand in hand, driving the manufacturing industry into a new era of intelligence. Our mission is to bring intelligent solutions to every machine and production line, transforming factories from mere mechanical operations into a smart brain that adjusts, optimizes, and innovates in real time. We believe the intelligent future has arrived, and we are standing at the heart of this transformation, moving forward with the industry towards a new, efficient, and sustainable future.

solutions.title: Industry
solutions.subtitle: Targeting the characteristics and needs of different industries, we provide customized technology solutions to help various industries achieve digital transformation and business innovation.
solutions.communicationDesc: Understand customer needs and industry characteristics through in-depth communication and research
solutions.productSelectionDesc: Provide customized product selection and solution design based on customer needs and industry characteristics
solutions.deliveryDesc: Ensure timely delivery of products and provide technical support to ensure smooth project progress
solutions.afterSalesDesc: Provide comprehensive after-sales service, including technical support, product maintenance, and upgrades

solutions01.title: Application of IO-Link Smart Sensors in Hydraulic Systems
solutions01.description: In the fields of industrial automation and construction machinery, hydraulic systems are widely used in key equipment such as injection molding machines, hydraulic presses, lifting equipment, and construction vehicles due to their outstanding energy conversion efficiency and powerful driving capability.

solutions02.title: Split-Type Level Sensor Solves Foam Interference and Space Constraints in Dairy Tank Level Measurement
solutions02.description: In the dairy processing industry, accurate monitoring of tank liquid levels is not only linked to production efficiency but also directly impacts product quality and safety.

solutions03.title: IO-Link Smart Sensors in Wind Turbine Hydraulic Systems
solutions03.description: In the context of a global shift toward a green and low-carbon energy structure, wind power—an important part of renewable energy—is experiencing continuous and rapid growth.

solutions04.title: Hot-Plug Mechanism Enables Rapid Modular Pallet Switching in Bus Welding Lines
solutions04.description: With the continuous advancement of smart manufacturing and Industry 4.0, coach welding lines are moving toward a new stage of higher automation, stronger flexibility, and deeper informatization.

solutions05.title: Dual Options of Vortex Flow Sensors and Flow Switches to Address Flow Monitoring Challenges
solutions05.description: In the field of industrial automation, accurate flow measurement and real-time monitoring are essential for ensuring production efficiency and equipment safety.

solutions06.title: SENTINEL Distributed I/O Modules in Photovoltaic Monocrystalline Silicon Production Lines
solutions06.description: With the global energy structure transforming, the photovoltaic industry, as a crucial part of clean energy, is rapidly developing.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: We look forward to cooperating with you. Please contact us through the following methods, and our professional team will provide you with the highest quality products and solutions.
contact.tianjinAddress: K2-5-303, Haitai Green Industry Base, No.6, Haitai Development 6th Road, Huayuan Industrial Zone, Tianjin

banner.title: Industrial
banner.subtitle: industrial Sensors
banner.description: As a detection device, Sensors can sense the measured information, and can transform the sensed information into electrical signals or other required forms, so as to meet the requirements of information transmission, processing, storage, display, Records and controls, etc.

productsSection.title: Sensor
productsSection.subtitle: Professional industrial sensor solutions for reliable data acquisition for your automation systems

thermalFlow.title: Thermal flow sensor
thermalFlow.description: Flow and temperature detection in one device

vortex.title: Vortex flow sensor
vortex.description: Reliable flow measurement for liquids and gases

pressure.title: Pressure sensor
pressure.description: Precise pressure sensing for automation systems

liquidLevel.title: Liquid level sensor
liquidLevel.description: Safe and accurate fluid level detection

inductive.title: Inductive proximity sensor
inductive.description: Detects metal objects without physical contact

banner.title: inductive proximity
banner.description: Inductive proximity switch is a kind of detection element. Through different physical principles, it makes non-contact induction on ferromagnetic metal objects, so as to detect whether the detected object reaches the effective induction range of the sensor, and output a certain form of signal.

multipleSpecs.title: Multiple specifications
multipleSpecs.description: Provide a variety of shapes and sizes to meet diverse working condition requirements.

economical.title: Economical and Affordable
economical.description: Relatively low cost advantage, meeting the demand while reducing the overall investment.

nonContact.title: Non-contact induction
nonContact.description: The state of an object can be judged without direct contact.

stableSignal.title: Stable signal output
stableSignal.description: When a change in the object's state is detected, a signal in a specific form can be output.

description.paragraph1: SENTINEL can provide inductive proximity switches with various shapes and sizes to meet the diversified needs of customers.
description.paragraph2: This kind of sensor has relatively low cost, and common machinery and equipment are mostly made of metal materials, so it is widely used in the field of equipment manufacturing, such as detecting distance, detecting structure in place, detecting the presence of objects, etc.

m8Series.challenge: Design of M8 X 1 cylindrical thread. Equipped with M12 x 1 connector to ensure reliable electrical connection. It has an IP67 protection level. Built - in short - circuit protection function.

m12Series.challenge: Design of M12 X 1 cylindrical thread. It supports two installation methods: flush and non-flush. It includes various output modes such as PNP normally open, PNP normally closed, NPN normally open, and NPN normally closed.

m30Series.challenge: The design of M30 X 1.5 cylindrical thread facilitates installation and fixation. Chrome-plated copper material is used, which has good corrosion resistance and electrical conductivity. Built-in reverse polarity protection function.

relatedProducts.beerIndustry: IO-Link Sensors Empower the Beer Industry

cta.title: Get your
cta.description: Our professional team will provide you with personalized solutions.

banner.title: IO-
banner.description: As an automation manufacturer that actively promotes IO-LINK, SENTINEL provides IO-LINK master modules that support multiple protocols, as well as a variety of IO-LINK slave devices. From sensors to controllers, brings customers a reliable and low-cost transmission method and easily achieves lower costs and higher efficiency.

standardized.title: Standardized & compatible
standardized.description: No special cables needed, works with existing setups

costEffective.title: Cost-effective upgrade
costEffective.description: Evolves existing tech, no system replacement, cuts complexity

ecosystem.title: Comprehensive ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Multi-protocol masters + diverse slaves, full-link coverage

efficient.title: Efficient & reliable
efficient.description: Low-cost transmission, boosting efficiency while reducing costs

description.paragraph1: IO-Link is the worlds first standardized IO technology for communication with sensors and actuators.
description.paragraph2: IO-Link is not a fieldbus, but a further development of the existing sensor and actuator connection technology.

master.challenge: IO-Link is a point-to-point communication protocol between IO system compatible with bus protocol and field devices (including sensors and actuators). Combining interface signal transmission with cable power supply technology can not only make the equipment intelligent, but also save cables, reduce interference and improve the reliability and predictability of the system.

hubs.challenge: As a communication interface independent of the field bus, the sensors, actuators and I/O supporting the IO-Link protocol are IO-Link slave devices, which greatly improves the reliability of the devices.

converter.challenge: The IO-Link Converter (CIOL-2AI-SC) is designed to convert two channels of 4-20mA/0-20mA analog signals into IO-Link communication format. It supports IO-Link V1.1 protocol with an M12 A-coded 4-pin Class A interface. Compatible with 2-wire, 3-wire, and 4-wire sensor connections, it features status LED indicators and is ideal for industrial signal acquisition applications.

cta.title: Get your
cta.description: Our professional team will provide you with personalized solutions.

banner.title: Thermal flow
banner.description: In the field of factory and process automation, it is necessary to monitor critical deviations in the flow rate of liquid media. It is commonly used to monitor the circulation of liquids such as coolant, the idling of pumps, etc.

thermalConductivity.title: Thermal conductivity principle
thermalConductivity.description: Precisely monitor liquids such as water in the pipeline

insertionMeasurement.title: Insertion measurement
insertionMeasurement.description: The switch point setting is simple and the installation is quick.

solidDurable.title: Solid and durable
solidDurable.description: High-strength plastic or stainless steel housing

multipleInterfaceSizes.title: Multiple interface sizes
multipleInterfaceSizes.description: Meet the needs of liquid flow monitoring in factory and process automation

description.paragraph1: Based on the thermal conductivity principle, SENTINEL's flow sensor can reliably monitor the flow limit value, and also monitor and alarm the temperature of the medium.
description.paragraph2: Insertion measurement, reliable monitoring of liquids, such aswater and oil in pipelines.

plsx.challenge: Monitor the flow of liquid medium, based on the principle of thermal conductivity. PBT shell, 304 stainless steel probe. Flexible selection of switch points. Potentiometer adjustment. M12x1 connector. LED strip instructions.

plsu.challenge: Based on the thermal conductivity principle. All stainless steel shell. The measuring medium is liquid. M18x1.5 internal thread. 3-wire PNP normally open output. Switching point adjustable via potentiometer. M12 Connector outlet.

plsn.challenge: Flow monitoring of liquid. Built-in temperature alarm. 304 stainless steel shell and probe. The value is displayed by digital tube. Protection class IP67. Optional bluetooth function.

relatedProducts.whatIsThermalConductivity: What is a Thermal Conductivity Flow Sensor
relatedProducts.beerIndustry: IO-Link Sensors Empower the Beer Industry

banner.title: Temperature
banner.subtitle: Temperature Sensor
banner.description: SENTINEL temperature sensors and transmitters are temperature detection devices that convert physical temperature into electrical or other types of output signals to meet the monitoring needs of industrial automation systems.

highPrecision.title: High precision & stability
highPrecision.description: Based on Pt1000 technology, the accuracy can reach ±1℃.

ioLink.title: IO-Link
ioLink.description: Implement remote configuration and real - time monitoring through the IO - Link interface

customization.title: Customization
customization.description: The length of the probe rod can be customized according to customer requirements.

multipleOutputMethods.title: Multiple output methods
multipleOutputMethods.description: It has two independent digital outputs and one analog output.

description.paragraph1: In industrial production, temperature switch is a reliable and practical equipment temperature detection device. SENTINEL's integrated intelligent temperature switch integrates measurement and display, which can provide a simple programming solution.
description.paragraph2: Compact temperature switch, specially designed for bearing internal temperature measurement, compact in appearance, customizable in probe length, with a temperature measurement range of 100°C, analog output, and outgoing wires and connectors.

sensor.challenge: SENTINEL's temperature sensor is a device used to measure liquid temperature, widely applied in industries such as industrial automation, food and beverage, machine tools, and metallurgy.

transmitter.challenge: A temperature transmitter is a device that converts temperature signals into standard electrical signals (such as 4 - 20mA), and is widely used in the field of industrial automation.

splitType.challenge: The detection probe can be flexibly installed in positions with a narrow space and harsh environment.

relatedProducts.hydraulicSystems: IO-Link Smart Sensors in Hydraulic Systems
relatedProducts.beerIndustry: IO-Link Sensors Empower the Beer Industry
relatedProducts.vortexFlowSensor: Vortex flow sensor on mold temperature controller

cta.title: Get your
cta.description: Our professional team will provide you with personalized solutions.

banner.title: Pressure
banner.description: SENTINEL's compact pressure sensors and pressure transmitters have: a variety of different connection sizes and output signals, as well as a wide pressure range, rich function settings and flexible installation methods, which can meet the various needs of actual production.

multipleSpecifications.title: Multiple specifications
multipleSpecifications.description: Multiple connection sizes to meet the installation requirements of different industrial scenarios.

ioLink.title: IO-Link
ioLink.description: Supports IO-Link technology, enabling high-precision data transmission with strong anti-interference capabilities.

richFunctions.title: Rich in functions
richFunctions.description: Diverse function settings can meet various needs in actual production.

industrialProtection.title: Industrial-grade protection
industrialProtection.description: IP67 protection level, suitable for harsh industrial environments, resistant to impact and vibration

description.paragraph1: Pressure is one of the most frequently measured parameters in industry, whether it is a press, a cooling circuit or a storage tank, there is a need to monitor and measure pressure parameters.
description.paragraph2: The pressure sensors of SENTINEL are equipped with IO-Link function. Thanks to the IO-Link technology, these sensors can directly convert the millivolt signals of pressure into digital signals, achieving high-precision data transmission and strong anti-interference capabilities.

foodBeverage.challenge: Pressure sensors are used for pressure monitoring in the food and beverage industry to ensure the pressure stability and safety during the production process. The combination of pressure sensors and IO-Link technology enables the automated control and remote monitoring of the production process.

transmitter.challenge: Digital circuit compensation. Strong anti-interference ability and high stability. Can measure gauge pressure and absolute pressure. The liquid contact diaphragm is made of 316L stainless steel.

sehSeries.challenge: Upper part of the housing can be rotated 300° to ensure the best installation direction. High-brightness dual-color large size digital display, support mirroring. Parameters can be set via IO-Link. The starting and ending points of the analog signal can be set.

relatedProducts.hydraulicSystems: IO-Link Smart Sensors in Hydraulic Systems
relatedProducts.beerIndustry: IO-Link Sensors Empower the Beer Industry

cta.title: Get your
cta.description: Our professional team will provide you with personalized solutions.

banner.title: liquid level
banner.description: The SENTINEL liquid level sensor is a critical device designed for detecting and measuring the height of liquids, providing real-time monitoring of level changes in containers or tanks. It is widely used in industrial automation, environmental protection, chemical energy, oil storage and transportation, food processing, and medical equipment, helping enterprises enhance safety, automation, and management efficiency.

doubleParameter.title: Double parameter monitoring
doubleParameter.description: Integrated liquid level and temperature dual monitoring.

ioLink.title: IO-Link
ioLink.description: Supports the IO-Link protocol, making it easy to connect to various industrial control systems.

multipleOutput.title: Multiple output modes
multipleOutput.description: It includes analog, digital signals, etc., and supports NPN/PNP/push - pull as well as normally open/normally closed.

safeConvenient.title: Safe and convenient
safeConvenient.description: Parameter locking function to prevent misoperation.

description.paragraph1: IO-Link Smart liquid level / Temperature Sensor. 4-digit large digital tube display, mirroring, semi-transparent design. The display panel adopts an integrated molded housing.
description.paragraph2: Standard 4-pin A-code M12 interface. Simple key operation, with key lock funcition. The upper part of the housing can be rotated 300°.

specs.processConnectionValue: | G1/2 external thread | G1/4 external thread | M18x1.5 internal thread | Split electronic compartment |

casesSection.title: Application
casesSection.description: SENTINEL's level sensors are widely applied in food and beverage, emulsion, pharmaceutical, chemical, and water treatment industries, enabling precise level monitoring in various liquid tanks, reactors, and pipeline systems.

beerProduction.challenge: Liquid level sensors are used throughout brewing, fermentation, storage, and filling stages, effectively preventing overflows or dry runs, and enhancing production efficiency and hygiene safety. With hygienic design and high protection levels, SENTINEL sensors support CTP/CIP/SIP cleaning processes, ensuring reliable and stable food-grade production operations.

emulsionProduction.challenge: Since the emulsion has a certain viscosity, and some products have hygiene requirements for the contact materials, the enterprise has selected the liquid level sensor made of SENTINEL's food - grade materials. The sensor can accurately monitor the liquid level in the tank, and can also monitor the temperature of the emulsion, which is convenient for the enterprise to control the production process.

beverageProduction.challenge: In the beverage production process, level sensors are used to monitor the liquid levels in storage tanks and filling machines. The split design addresses the issues of space limitations and hygiene management. Moreover, the level sensors of SENTINEL integrate a temperature monitoring function, enabling real-time monitoring of liquid temperature changes to ensure the safety and quality of beverage production.

relatedProducts.splitTypeSensor: Split-Type Level Sensor Solves Foam Interference
relatedProducts.ioLinkHydraulic: IO-Link Smart Sensors in Hydraulic Systems
relatedProducts.ioLinkBeer: IO-Link Sensors Empower the Beer Industry

banner.title: vortex flow
banner.description: In the field of modern industrial automation, accurate flow measurement is crucial for ensuring the efficiency and quality of the production process. Vortex flow sensors play an indispensable role in many application scenarios due to their high precision, stability, and reliability.

principleFunction.title: Principle and function
principleFunction.description: Adopting the von Kármán vortex street principle, it supports the output and dual display of both flow rate and temperature signals.

ioLink.title: IO-Link
ioLink.description: There are various output methods, and it is compatible with IO-Link function.

flexibleSignals.title: Flexible signals
flexibleSignals.description: The switch signal supports various types such as NPN/PNP/push - pull.

dataRecord.title: Data record
dataRecord.description: The cumulative traffic recording function is convenient for statistical analysis.

description.paragraph1: Von Kaman vortex principle. Flow, temperature dual switching signal output, dual display. High-resolution lPS display.Four viewing directions can be switched. Cumulative flow recording function. Analog or switch output, compatible with lO-Link protocol.
description.paragraph2: Switching signal NONC, NPN/PNP/push-pull optional. Units can be selected, simple button menu operation. Various thread specifications, suitable for different installation requirements. Compact size, takes up little space. Standard 4-pin M12 electrical interface.

specs.outputFunctionValue: | Two 4-20mA outputs | Two-way switching IO-Link | Two 0-10V outputs |

casesSection.title: Product
casesSection.description: Vortex flow sensors are widely used in industrial pure water monitoring, flow and temperature management in mold temperature machines, cooling water monitoring, the food and beverage industry, etc.

fourToTwentyMaOutputs.challenge: Real-time monitoring of medium flow rate and temperature ensures precise and stable mold temperature control, enhancing both production efficiency and product quality.

zeroToTenVoltOutputs.challenge: Its independence from fluid conductivity allows for stable and accurate flow measurement of low-conductivity industrial pure water, addressing the instability issues of electromagnetic flowmeters in such applications.

twoWaySwitchingIOLink.challenge: The sensor monitors coolant flow conditions to prevent equipment damage due to cooling failure, ensuring safe and reliable system operation.

relatedProducts.ioLinkHydraulic: IO-Link Smart Sensors in Hydraulic Systems
relatedProducts.dualOptionsVortex: Dual Options of Vortex Flow Sensors
relatedProducts.vortexMoldTemperature: Vortex flow sensor on mold temperature controller
relatedProducts.ioLinkBeerIndustry: IO-Link Sensors Empower the Beer Industry

banner.title: CONNECTIVITY
banner.description: SENTINEL offers a wide variety of products are available, including male-female connectors, pre-cast connectors, junction boxes, as well as cables, and accessories. we can provide standard products and customized products to customer needs.

customStandard.title: Custom & standard options
customStandard.description: Offers both to meet various needs

harshEnvironments.title: Fits harsh environments
harshEnvironments.description: Works stably in tough industrial settings

costEfficient.title: Cost-saving & efficient
costEfficient.description: Optimizes wiring for lower cost and higher efficiency

description.paragraph1: The connectivity system is an indispensable product for connecting field devices and control devices.
description.paragraph2: The connectivity products make customer wiring systems low-cost and more efficient.

specs.productTypeValue: | 7/8" POWER CABLE | Industrial Ethernet Cable | Field-Wireable Connectors | Cordsets | Junction Boxes |

connectors.challenge: SENTINEL- field wiring connector, which covers M8, M12 and M16 standard connector sizes, and has straight-line and right-angle connections. Field connector allows customers to connect with their own cables.

junctionBoxes.challenge: M12 and M8 standard interfaces can be provided, as well as 4-channel and 8-channel interface channels. Each channel can be divided into single-signal output and dual-signal output.

cordsets.challenge: SENTINEL- sensor/actuator connector system covers prefabricated connectors with M8, M12, M16 and 7/8" standard connection sizes.

relatedProducts.ioLinkConvertersDesc: SENTINEL sensor/actuator connector system with M8, M12, M16 standards
relatedProducts.digitalSignalsDesc: Standard 7/8" power connector for SENTINEL bus module products
relatedProducts.distributedModulesDesc: Tailored connectivity solutions for specific applications

cta.description: Our professional team will provide you with personalized solutions.

banner.title: I/O
banner.description: As a professional Fieldbus module manufacturer, SENTINEL provides factory automation with Fieldbus modules that support various protocols such as Profibus-DP, Profinet, ModbusTCP, EtherCAT, CC-LINK, CC-LINK IE Field Basic.

wideProtocolSupport.title: Wide protocol support
wideProtocolSupport.description: Compatible with multiple protocols and adaptable to various systems.

flexibleInstallation.title: Flexible installation
flexibleInstallation.description: On-site installation & Cabinet installation, suitable for different scenarios.

topReliability.title: Top reliability
topReliability.description: High-quality, stable performance for industrial communication needs.

technicalUpdate.title: Technical Update
technicalUpdate.description: Upgrades traditional point-to-point links, making industrial setups smarter.

description.paragraph1: The products are mainly divided into two categories, one is a high protection level (IP67) series that can be used for on-site installation; the other is a compact single independent product series that can be installed in the cabinet.
description.paragraph2: As an upgrade to the traditional point-to-point connection, the Fieldbus module is now widely used in industrial fields.

specs.protocolTypeValue: | PROFINET | CC-Link IE Field Basic | EtherCAT |
specs.signalTypeValue: | input | output | input/output adaptive | input+output | Analog input |

ip67.challenge: The IP67 series modules are particularly suitable for outdoor or harsh industrial environments, such as places with high humidity and a lot of dust. It supports the near - installation of sensors and actuators, reducing wiring costs and installation time.

ip20.challenge: The IO modules of the IP20 series are specifically designed for high-density I/O integration environments and are suitable for relatively clean environments, such as indoor equipment cabinets. This series of modules integrates 32 I/O points and supports various flexible configurations.

sap.challenge: The IO Module SAP is an industrial - grade I/O module. It has an input - output adaptive mechanism, which can simplify the deployment process and enhance system consistency. It provides stable communication performance and a rigorous electrical protection strategy to ensure the reliable operation of the system.

relatedProducts.ioModuleTbr: IO Module on TBR Tire Conveyor Lines
relatedProducts.ioLinkModbus: IO-Link Master Modules with Modbus-TCP Protocol

banner.title: IO-Link
banner.description: The newly launched IO-Link relay module by SENTINEL will greatly leverage this advantage of IO-Link, enabling users to reduce engineering costs and labor costs, especially for projects that use a large number of relays in electrical cabinets.

technologicalInnovation.title: Technological Innovation
technologicalInnovation.description: The world's first relay module integrated with IO-Link functionality

highEfficiencyExpansion.title: High-Efficiency Expansion
highEfficiencyExpansion.description: A 4-port IO-Link master can connect 128 relays

smartMonitoring.title: Smart Monitoring
smartMonitoring.description: Real-time monitoring of temperature, overcurrent, and switching cycles

flexibleApplication.title: Flexible Application
flexibleApplication.description: Compatible with various brand main stations and relays, and can be freely plugged and unplugged.

description.paragraph1: Compared with traditional expansion output modules connected to the same number of relays, IO-Link relay modules can save 40% of the cost.
description.paragraph2: Remote monitoring and maintenance simplify wiring and significantly reduce labor costs (up to 95% savings).

specs.productTypeValue: | IO-Link Expandable Relay Module |  Relay Module Expansion Sub-Module |
specs.currentRequiredByLoad: Current required by the load power supply
specs.relayContactTypeValue: | One set of normally open + one set of normally closed |
specs.installationMethodValue: | DIN35 standard guide rail mounting or fixing holes |

expandableRelay.challenge: IO-Link remote I/O device. 16 channels, single output 150 mA per channel, expandable.
expandableRelay.solution: IO-Link V1.1 compliant.DIN35 standard rail mounting or screw fixing.
expandableRelay.result: Communication and load power supply via pluggable push-in terminals.

sixteenChannelSub.solution: Standard base compatible with relays from various brands.
sixteenChannelSub.result: SPDT contacts. DIN35 standard rail mounting or screw fixing.

eightChannelSub.solution: Standard base compatible with relays from various brands.
eightChannelSub.result: SPDT contacts. DIN35 standard rail mounting or screw fixing.

cookie.bannerText: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. Some cookies are essential for the website to function properly, while others help us improve our services and show relevant advertisements.

company.tagline: Innovation makes good products, Focus makes better services
